definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The jogger made an analytical analogy between the ecology and geology .
sentences.chinese: 慢跑者在生态学和地质学之间进行了切析类比。

sentences.english: As geologists, we work in the fied most of the time.
sentences.chinese: 作为地质学家，我们大部分时间在野外工作。

sentences.english: This is the webpage of Geobase.
sentences.chinese: 这是地质学文摘数据库的网页。

sentences.english: Concentrators in geological sciences elect either geology or geography.
sentences.chinese: 选修地质学或地理课程。

sentences.english: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.english: Local authorities and geologists are still investigating what caused the sinkhole.
sentences.chinese: 当地官员及地质学家仍在调查此次地陷发生的原因。

sentences.english: Mineralogy is a brand of the great earth science geology.
sentences.chinese: 矿物学是大地科学地质学的一个分支。

sentences.english: Its existence depends entirely on what geologists call the mid-Atlantic ridge.
sentences.chinese: 它的存在完全取决于地质学家所称的中大西洋海脊。

sentences.english: Structural feature and basin-mountain coupling analysis of North Sichuan Basin;
sentences.chinese: 近年来盆山耦合已经成为地质学研究的热点之一。

sentences.english: The types of data which geologists collect are quite varied and numerous.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家所收集的资料是多种多样的并且数量很大。

sentences.english: The geologist proves up a coal deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家探明了一个煤矿的藏量。

sentences.english: Now it is being applied to geology.
sentences.chinese: 目前它正被应用于地质学。

sentences.english: Rusty the Nimble Numbat is discovered by a pair of geologists.
sentences.chinese: 一地质学家发现敏捷的袋食蚁兽Rusty。

sentences.english: The geologist proves up a coal deposit.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家探明了一个煤矿的藏量。

sentences.english: Geologists study lineaments in the pictures.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家们研究图片中的地貌。

sentences.english: Fred had an extensive background in geology.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德有广泛的地质学背景知识。
